alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:35PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, Walton, southwestern Holmes and southwestern Washington Counties through 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/... At 1034 PM EDT/934 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles southwest of Santa Rosa Beach to 28 miles southeast of Destin to 32 miles southwest of Panama City Beach to 53 miles southwest of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Springfield, Hiland Park, Eglin Air Force Base, Tyndall Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Parker, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Ebro, Oakwood Hills and Cluster Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
